narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Imani Wellness LLC is a Counselor, Mental Health provider based in Coolidge, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $76.5M in Medicaid payments across 141K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $76.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
